chunks.lyrics: M Y D Y I N G B R I D E
A L L S W E P T A W A Y
\ - Slide Down to/Down From (Blank spaces indicate length of slide)
( / ) - Legato Slide (Blank spaces indicate length of slide)
P.H - Pinch Harmonic/Artificial Harmonic (Affected notes shown as < >)
REST - Rest and sustain rest for the duration of blank space
Riff 1: Guitars 1 and 2 with heavy distortion (Play 4 times)
Violin Riff 1 arranged for guitar - tuned as guitar 1 and 2 (Play 4 times)
Riff 2.1: Guitar 1 only for 1 & 3/4 bars, guitar 2 enters on last three chords
Riff 2.3: Guitars 1 and 2 (Play once: note the different chord at the end)
Riff 3: Guitars 1 and 2 (Play 4 times, then play tail)
Guitars 1 and 2 play Riff 2.2 3 times, then add tail
| Riff 2.2 Tail ( Tempo changes to 104 BPM ) |
Both guitars rest, bass plays for 5 bars with violin
Violin Riff 2 arranged for guitar - tuned as guitar 1 and 2 (Play twice)
During last two bars of violin riff, guitar one plays Fill 1
*Scrape pick along lower strings from first fret up to higher frets*
Riff 4: Guitars 1 and 2, while guitar 3 plays Lead Riff 1 (Play 4 times)
Lead Riff 1: Guitar 3 with heavy distortion (Play once)
Riff 3.1: Guitars 1 and 2 (Play 4 times) ( Tempo changes to 84 BPM )
Guitars 1 and 2 play Riff 1 3 times, then play tail
| Riff 1 Tail: Guitars 1 and 2 (Play once, note the variation at the end) |
Tab summary: Riff 1 X 4 + Violin Riff 1 X 4
